bibl.title: A Bilingual Account of Monies Received.
Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond
bibl.author: MIDGLEY, James H.

bibl.note: Rent payments (?) for groups of persons from 3 villages into the bank at Crocodilopolis, and that of a village, Arsinoe. Provenance unknown, 24 March 235 B.C.
MIDGLEY James H., A Bilingual Account of Monies Received.
Janet H. JOHNSON (Ed.), Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond = SAOC. 51 (Chicago, 1992) pp. 237-241, 1 pl.
